backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three feature requirements with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their roles in styling, configuration, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading fonts and mounting the React app with dark mode enabled.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing section navigation and rendering major site sections conditionally.
frontend/src/components/icons/DiscordIco: SVG-based Discord icon component with customizable className.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact section showing WhatsApp and Discord buttons using configured constants.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Dashbo: Dashboard with tab-based navigation and dynamic content including payment, panels, support, and status views.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero banner featuring background image, title, subtitle, and neon-themed decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/marketing/PanelC: Panel card displaying pricing options and triggering onBuy actions via card or button interaction.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Panels: Displays available panels and opens a payment modal when a panel is selected.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Paymen: Shows UPI payment details, copy-to-clipboard functionality, and payment instructions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Pricin: Renders a pricing table for all panels with desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Provides a sticky navigation bar for switching between app sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteFo: Displays site footer with branding, copyright, and a referral link.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteHe: Shows the site header with logo and title.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Exports the app’s UPI ID constant.
frontend/src/config/social.ts: Exports WhatsApp number and Discord invite URL.
frontend/src/data/panels.ts: Defines panel types and exports pricing data for all panels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom OKLCH cyberpunk theme colors plus numerous neon, glow, glassmorphism, and hover effect utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App with global styles.
frontend/src/utils/paymentProof.ts: Builds a WhatsApp deep-link containing a prefilled payment confirmation message, optionally including the panel name.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp link with a prefilled message indicating interest in purchasing a specific panel.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended neon/cyberpunk colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state, including required UI style, updated payment flow, Discord link rules, and known issues to fix.
